title: [Large-Scale] Deep Learning-Based Visual Data Analysis for Glaucoma Progression Prediction

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Statistics and Machine Learning Theory, Foundational Knowledge of Calculus and Linear Algebra
context.additional_context: Educational program focused on mathematical modeling and deep learning techniques using medical imaging data, including case studies on glaucoma diagnosis and prediction with real-world datasets.

learning_goals: Explain and analyze mathematical characteristics of retinal OCT image data
Implement a glaucoma progression prediction system by applying self-supervised learning principles of the Vision Transformer (ViT) model
Quantitatively evaluate model performance using ROC curves and AUC metrics
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
